description:
syscall: regenerate z* files for netbsd

Fix mkerrors.sh so that it works on NetBSD.

Remove directory mode bits from types - this already appears in errors.

Regenerate the z* files now that cgo is working.

syscall: regenerate z* files for netbsd

Fix mkerrors.sh so that it works on NetBSD.

Remove directory mode bits from types - this already appears in errors.

Regenerate the z* files now that cgo is working.
